Does anyone know where to get subtitles for this? English - Swedish?!
Is there subtitles with the movie? I only found subs for a 2-cd rip, but this seems to be only 1-disc? Can somebody help?
It is incredibly hard, if not impossible, to find a subtitle for this version. It seems to be the least popular release of the movie, and I don't see why the 1988 release is nowhere to be found...
